example: Our country is in disintegration.

function: concess(承认 妥协 让步) --> 妥协的名词
example: We can not make heavy concession to the matter.

function: Frostpunk: Escort the refugees back to our city.
example: Escort the refugees back to our city.

function: evade(逃避) --> 名词形式 逃避
example: Don't let this issue be your evasion's excuse.

function: stay or stray, the choice is yours.
example: Don't make you stray in the darkness.

function: em(下功夫) + bro(兄弟) + ider --> 下功夫给自家兄弟绣花
example: There is also a nice casket to embroider various gem in addition.

function: fragile易受伤害的 --> frail少女
example: She is not a fragile frail.

function: con(共同) + found(奠基) --> 阿里每个人都想当领域的奠基人没人想做螺丝钉 混乱
example: To replace thought with reverie is to confound a poison with a food.

function: counter(面对) + measure(测量方法) --> 对策
example: Do we have any strategy or countermeasure to deal with this?

function: 兰博rumble基尼 轰隆隆的驶来
example: The rumble of distant thunder seemed to echo my inner turmoil.

function: tram(揣着) + mel(猫) --> 你把你家猫揣在兜里带出门束缚它的行动
example: The invention discloses a fishing type trammel net.

function: con(共同) + fine(安好) --> Frostpunk画地为牢限制大家行动为了安好的生活下去
example: The refiner defined a definite confine with her fine finger.

function: My habitual. 我的习惯呐
example: Your character is essentially the sum of your habits; it is how you habitually act.

function: over(在上) + rule(管理规定) --> 统治 否决
example: Your emotions overrule your stomach and fatigue.

function: The Champion League.
example: The Champion League.

function: fo(佛) + ment(门) --> 佛门弟子煽动反朝廷暴乱
example: Foment a mass exodus of key executives who actually know how to run the giant computer company.

function: ponderous沉重的 --> ponder沉思
example: We can ponder over the ways and means for raising funds before the construction work starts.

function: 开始着手 获得学位的意思
example: The performances will commence in a minute.

function: sur(超越) + mount(爬山) --> 越过山峰
example: We were able to surmount so many obstacles.

function: str(street大街上) + roll(滚动) --> 大街上滚动 压马路 --> 闲逛
example: Stroll down Narodni to pick up the pulse of Prague and then pause beside the theatre.

function: 胃 忍耐
example: Her stomach churned with nausea.

function: bai(baidu公司) + t(腾讯) --> 白领和学生的诱饵
example: The fish took the bait!

function: pen(拿着笔) + chant(唱歌) --> 嗜好 倾向
example: The brain also has a penchant for symmetry.

function: que(缺) + ll(两个擎天柱) --> 少两个顶梁柱起义就被镇压和平息了
example: This medicine will quell your sore throat.

function: 在迷宫中遇到妹子(maze) --> 迷宫
example: We need to find a path through a complicated maze.

function: shack(煞客小屋) --> 小屋来禁锢性奴隶
example: Superstition is a great shackle on men's minds.

function: 等于headless不走心不过脑少一根弦
example: My wife is always heedless.

function: van(范海辛) + quish(窥视) --> 范海辛窥视吸血鬼 为了征服打败他们
example: You must vanquish your fears.

function: dogma(狗它妈 教条) --> 教条的
example: It seems as if folks are more dogmatic than ever, but maybe the pundits are creating that illusion.

function: per(每个人) + ceive(受到) --> 察觉
example: The concept reality means to each of us what we perceive, what we experience.

function: laby(拉比 犹太人牧师) + rinth(润色) --> 谜一样神圣的 --> 迷宫
example: The labyrinth is the organ in your inner ear that enables you to maintain balance.

function: avow公开承认 --> disavowal 否定
example: I know that disavowal is an unusual form of betrayal.

function: en(使用) + dorse(雨打) --> 互相认可才站在一个屋檐下避雨
example: Democrats generally endorse the cap-and-trade plan in the bill.

function: rav(RAV4车) + age(年代) --> 日本车满大街事故多发毁坏路况
example: The forests were ravaged by fire.

function: barrier 障碍物 --> barricade设路障
example: Police made the barricades.

function: 快速的, 准时到达, 提示促进
example: I'll prompt her if she forgets her lines.

function: assemble召集 --> dissemble隐藏
example: Assemble the army then dissemble it.

function: discern辨别 + ible --> 可辨别的
example: The contour of the picture is still discernible.

function: annihi(按你嗨) + late(晚一些的) --> 晚一点在按倒你嗨 --> 先歼灭敌人
example: They want to annihilate us because we were different.

function: up(上) + rising(升起旗帜) --> 揭竿起义
example: The popular uprising unfolding in Iran right now really is remarkable.

function: lo(搂着) + co(口) + mote(升起) --> 头部移动给我口交 --> 移动
example: Continue to locomote using your heels only for two minutes.

function: error错误 --> erroneous错误的
example: What you have done is fully erroneous.

function: def(定义) + i(我) + ant(蚂蚁) --> 把我定义成蝼蚁 --> 蔑视的 目中无人的 挑衅的
example: It stood on the edge of a cliff, grim and defiant, seemingly clinging to rock.

function: obey屈服 --> obedience 服从
example: You are learning true obedience and deference.

function: in(不) + subordinate(从属) --> 不屈从的
example: My wife is an insubordinate frail.

function: ef(去掉) + face(脸 面) --> 抹掉
example: The lapse of year will never efface that scene of ruin from my memory.

function: fei(林飞) + gn(搞呢 锻炼呢 学习呢) --> 都是假装的
example: Many, in fact, feign love of life to evade love itself.

function: des(下达) + patch(打补丁) --> 派发 发送
example: A notice sent by cable shall be deemed to have been served on the day following the despatch of the cable.

function: be(被) + reave(剥夺) --> 使失去
example: Even if they rear children, I will bereave them of every one.

function: il(不) + legible(清晰的) --> 不可辨认的
example: However, erosion and a crack in the stone make the end of the passage almost illegible.

function: carry运 --> carriage运送
example: If you have a carriage, bring it.

function: use leash to lash
example: He use leash to lash his son.

function: exclude排出 --> exclusion排出
example: It is not feasible to search all documents at the exclusion of one term.

function: conceal or reveal
example: I did not conceal anything from him.

function: be prone to
example: Unfortunately, women may be more prone to the feeling than men because of how we relate to each other.

function: en(使能) + trap陷阱 --> 使落入陷阱
example: The hunters used nets to entrap the lion.

function: e(外) + vade(出) --> 逃跑 逃避
example: They evade paying taxes by living abroad.

function: as(因为) + si(死) + du(读) + ous(的) --> 因为不聪明死读书就必须勤勉
example: We study assiduous, live pleased and interesting. I love our school.

function: 米格不如F22 虚弱的
example: To supplement their meagre income, often he used to go fishing with his friends.

function: 教授professor公开声明profess
example: I profess that I was surprised at the news.

function: neglect --> negligent
example: My wife is a negligent woman.

function: circum(圆圈) + scribe(划 画) --> 画地为牢
example: The principal has requested all teachers to circumscribe failures in red on the report cards.

function: 附体了 --> 被妖怪附体 --> 变得无用了
example: Love is the foundation of life for without it, every other thing is futile.

function: shun(伤) --> 受伤了要避免运动 回避激烈的事件
example: If it confuses you in your flower-weaving， I will shun your lonely garden.

function: fall(陨落 失败) + ible --> 容易失败的
example: He thinks because all our knowledge comes from experience, it's inherently fallible.

function: rush out --> 击溃
example: It's not clear at what point this will turn into a cull or a rout.

function: stead(稳定) + fast(快) --> 稳准狠 --> 坚定的 给柯南喂饭的技巧
example: Let me thank our many partners, in both initiatives, for their steadfast commitment and support.

function: use gold to gild
example: Paint it with colors, gild it with gold.

function: 为啥提哥 --> prestige在他面前提哥哥那时候有威望 现在没了 --> 只剩残余了
example: This last vestige of rural life has since owned defeat and slunk away ashamed and unnoticed.

function: gain(获得) + ful --> 只知道取得不知道付出 --> 唯利是图的
example: In addition, the crises will further erode young people’s ability to find gainful employment.

function: in(里面) + cite(引用) --> 刺激
example: In other words, they will incite the armed peasants against the advanced workers.

function: 动词名词  处理
example: They dispose of the city's waste in the sea.

function: rupt断了 --> 碎片
example: In the event of a large rupture, the system would vent directly to the atmosphere.

function: pro(前) + long(长) --> 向前长 --> 延长
example: What factors shorten, prolong or amplify the effect of deception.

function: use leash to lash
example: He use leash to lash his son.

function: 柳儿 --> 少女的诱惑
example: He attempted to lure her away from husband and family.

function: intrude伸出长棍 强迫她obtrude
example: It is unwise for an outsider to obtrude his opinions into a family quarrel.

function: 下降斜坡衰落谢绝
example: The decline in sales embarrassed our company.

function: treat(对待) + chery --> 背叛她了 --> 背叛
example: A network of hate, treachery, and fanaticism was closing around him.

function: explicit明显的 --> elicit 引出
example: And he does things I would never do. He lies to people himself, for example, to elicit the truth.

function: recalculate(重新计算) --> 我的顽抗的人我必须证明我算的对
example: There were the disagreements about how to handle the disintegration of Yugoslavia and the often recalcitrant stance of Russia.

function: acquire(得到) + scence(景) --> 走后门了默许我坐在有景色的窗户边
example: Yet some suggest that this is a sign of naiveté or acquiescence to these countries’ repression of their own people.

function: Frostpunk: Convoy the refugees back to home.
example: I'm expecting to hear a convoy of cars pulling up, but nothing, silence.

function: pro(先) + cure(治愈) --> 先把病治好就能取得成功了
example: That her social status would procure love from these people. And that she would never be alone.

function: medi(中间) + ate(结果) --> 间接的 调停
example: The government must mediate the struggle for water resources.

function: 为了luck好运我lurk潜伏在一旁
example: Underneath this interface lurk two vision systems that work in parallel.

function: ex(外) + tric(三个) + ate(结果) --> 排出3人去解救你
example: We expect him to extricate our country from this before he leaves office.

function: repay(还钱) + cious --> 总要人还钱 人家没欠你钱 --> 贪婪的
example: Locals often have bitter memories of rapacious Western colonialists and Arab slave traders.

function: transc(到达) + end(尽头) --> 胜过 超越
example: To free your mind you have to transcend the judge and the victim.

function: s + nag(膝盖) --> 有障碍
example: But unfortunately there's a snag.

function: em(利用) + bell(铃铛) + ish --> 装饰
example: But people do tend to embellish their avatars somewhat.
